channel.title: Dicing help
channel.description: I've looked for hours trying to find how to a "Dice" like thing; such as ::roll makes a random number message to all, for everyone it's the same number, and it goes from 1-100, so if someone were to go ::roll it would send to all "playernamehere has just rolled a numberhere on the dice! Gambler won!" or "Gambler lost!" if it's under like 55 (making 55X2 dicing) my source is Allstar, if anyone can help I would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: Dicing help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnerofppl Pwnerofppl
item.description:
@Pwnerofppl wrote:

I’ve looked for hours trying to find how to a “Dice” like thing; such as ::roll makes a random number message to all, for everyone it’s the same number, and it goes from 1-100, so if someone were to go ::roll it would send to all “playernamehere has just rolled a numberhere on the dice! Gambler won!” or “Gambler lost!” if it’s under like 55 (making 55X2 dicing) my source is Allstar, if anyone can help I would greatly appreciate it.
